title: Accept Monero
subtitle: Start accepting private, low-fee payments for your business.
description: Learn how to accept Monero payments for your business.

chooseSetup.title: Choose Your Setup
chooseSetup.intro: How you accept Monero depends on your needs:

wallet.title: Wallet
wallet.description: Best for occasional payments or getting started. Generate a QR code with the amount, customer scans and pays. No fees, no setup.

pos.title: Point-of-Sale App
pos.description: Dedicated apps for regular in-person use. Get fiat price conversion, invoice tracking, and configurable confirmation settings.

processor.title: Payment Processor
processor.description: Third-party services that handle payments for you. Quick setup, plugins for most platforms, small fees (~0.5-1%). Some offer auto-conversion to fiat.

selfHosted.title: Self-Hosted
selfHosted.description: Run your own payment server for complete control. Zero fees, full privacy, invoice management, and works for both online and in-person. Requires a server and technical setup.

acceptPayment.title: Accept Your First Payment!
acceptPayment.description: A customer scans your QR code or copies your address and sends Monero from their wallet. You'll see the payment appear in your wallet or dashboard within seconds.
acceptPayment.confirmations: Transactions are typically confirmed in ~2 minutes. For small purchases, most merchants hand over goods immediately. For larger amounts, waiting 1-2 confirmations adds security.
acceptPayment.tip: If you're using a wallet, your seed phrase is the only way to recover funds. Write it down and store it securely offline - never share it with anyone.

getListed.title: Get Listed
getListed.description: Let the Monero community know you accept payments. Getting listed in merchant directories helps customers find your business.
